article_node.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from withholding grants in lawsuit Nashville joined
article_node.summary: A U.S. District Court has ruled in favor of Nashville and other local governments, preventing federal agencies from withholding grant funds tied to the Trump administration's policy agenda. This ruling is part of a broader legal battle where Nashville has joined multiple lawsuits against the Trump administration regarding federal funding cuts and conditions. The city is also facing local challenges, including a controversial proposal to rezone land for new housing, which has sparked significant community debate.
